definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The delegation returned to Beijing after their visit to five European countries.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲五國的考察團已於今日返抵北京。

sentences.english: Organizers of the tours, however, say that they satisfy a need.
sentences.chinese: 考察團組織者說，目前的需求是令人滿意的。

sentences.english: Others told the visiting group that the fire may have been part of an effort to clear land for the expansion of a cattle farm.
sentences.chinese: 其他人則告訴考察團放火可能是爲了燒山養牛。

sentences.english: Some delegation members later said they would consider investment in Zhuhai.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，考察團部分成員表示將考慮在珠海投資置業。

sentences.english: A few years ago, I have worked as members of our city, education delegation visited Japan.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，我曾作爲我們市教育考察團的成員出訪日本。

definition: pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
to pay a visit/to call on
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
YMCA (international Christian youth movement, formed in 1844)
matters relating to the Chinese diaspora (as a concern of the Chinese government)
